San_Buenaventura_(Ventura).KRUZ (FM):
KRUZ (106.3 FM, 106.3 Spin FM) is a commercial radio station in Oak View, California, broadcasting to the Ventura, California, area. KRUZ used to broadcast a digital HD Radio signal, but as of May 2016 KRUZ only broadcasts an analog signal. As the licenses for HD Radio signals are permanent, KRUZ is still licensed to broadcast in HD.


== History ==


=== Early years ===
The station began broadcasting in 1982, with the KMGQ call letters and a soft rock format.
